item.title: Ergonomic Keyboards
item.description: Ergonomic Keyboards An ergonomic keyboard is a tool for inputting symbols to a computer in a way that doesn’t compromise on the user’s comfort. Typical features that might make a keyboard more ergonomic that the traditional counterpart are a split design, ortholinear or columnar staggered keys, or non-traditional angles.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello, World! Hey there! I am Eben Quenneville, a Physics student at the University of New Hampshire. This is a publicly accessible sub-section of my personal notes network built using Obsidian.

item.title: Ergogen
item.description: Ergogen is a tool for systematically and parametically creating keyboard designs. I’ve used it in the past, but it has changed a lot so I’m basically relearning the tool from flatfootfox.com/ergogen-part1-units-points/.

item.title: Concepts
item.description: Topic: Psychology Concepts Concepts are ideas, rules, or mental groupings of similar objects, events, people, and activities. You have a concept of a ball that includes footballs, rubber balls, soccer balls, and cannon balls, for example.

item.title: Obsidian Notes
item.description: Obsidian Notes What is Obsidian? In late 2022, I was lucky enough to stumble onto a wonderful project called Obsidian Notes. The principle is simple: a note-taking software composed of plain markdown files with a focus on interconnection and extensibility.

item.title: Biking
item.description: Biking Research As winter settled in and I began to spend more time inside, I was looking to get into a new excerise hobby. I spent a while thinking about it, and eventually decided that I wanted to start biking.

item.title: Silvis
item.description: Introduction After building Tantalus and another Dactyl Manuform 5x6, I still wasn’t fully satisfied with my secondary keyboard. My Dactyl Manuform R-Track is perfect for my primary setup, but I have been moving around more and doing school work on a laptop.

item.title: Icarus
item.description: Icarus Introduction I had just finished a written math assignment when I thought to myself: why should I have to compute something on my calculator, then enter it into the computer? ...

item.title: Tantalus
item.description: Introduction This is my 3rd ergo keyboard, and my first completly custom design from scratch. My previous build, the Dactyl Manuform R Track, was almost perfect.
